info.author: Michal Proszek
info.description:
imgur-shot |Build Status|
=========================

A simple app made for rapid screenshots sharing.

**imgur-shot** takes a screenshot using scrot and **uploads** it to
imgur.

Requirements
------------

-  scrot
-  libnotify-dev
-  libgtk-3-dev
-  python-gobject

Debian Quickstart
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::

    apt-get install scrot libnotify-dev libgtk-3-dev python-gobject

Running
~~~~~~~

To take a screenshot **of whole screen** execute:

::

    imgur-shot

use flag **–select** to select a window or an area

::

    imgur-shot --select

Use **ESC** to cancel.

More
~~~~
For more information check out the project's website.

.. |Build Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/poxip/imgur-shot.svg?branch=master
   :target: https://travis-ci.org/poxip/imgur-shot
info.name: imgur-shot
info.summary: A screenshot tool made for rapid screnshots sharing
info.html_description:
A simple app made for rapid screenshots sharing.

imgur-shot takes a screenshot using scrot and uploads it to imgur.

Requirements

  • scrot
  • libnotify-dev
  • libgtk-3-dev
  • python-gobject

Debian Quickstart

apt-get install scrot libnotify-dev libgtk-3-dev python-gobject

Running

To take a screenshot of whole screen execute:

imgur-shot

use flag –select to select a window or an area

imgur-shot --select

Use ESC to cancel.

More

For more information check out the project’s website.
